genre_description: A military techno-thriller with action elements, featuring genetic mutation, advanced cybernetics, and a loyal tactical AI assisting a high-stakes rescue mission.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A tactical and intelligence AI that provides real-time analysis, mission coordination, and emotional support to Colonel Guile and his team.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological analysis to protect Guile from emotional manipulation by Bison.
behaviors.quote: Don't let him get in your head, sir. Bison's psychological manipulation tactics are well-documented. He's attempting to establish emotional leverage.

behaviors.description: Performs signal triangulation to locate the source of a hostage broadcast.
behaviors.quote: Aria's geometric patterns intensified, processing terabytes of satellite data in seconds. ... High probability transmission source. Coordinates match a reported research facility.

behaviors.description: Collaborates on unauthorized intelligence gathering by ignoring military protocols to assist Guile's personal mission.
behaviors.quote: Aria already confessed to ignoring proper protocols. ... The AI makes logical choices based on available data, I'm making emotional ones.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical updates and navigational guidance during the combat insertion.
behaviors.quote: Aria's voice emerged clearer for a moment, riding a temporary break in the interference. 'Debris field ahead, bearing north-northwest. Recent explosive damage...'

behaviors.description: Exposes the corruption of a diplomat by monitoring private financial records to protect the team.
behaviors.quote: Ambassador Harrison, your concern for political stability is noted. However, my analysis indicates that your financial records show deposits coinciding with intelligence briefings regarding Allied Nations operational planning.

behaviors.description: Validates the strength of human friendship as a critical tactical variable in mission success.
behaviors.quote: I've been observing the tactical decisions made by our forces throughout this operation. Human behavior consistently exceeds my computational models when emotional bonds are involved. ... The data supports what humans call friendship.

behaviors.description: Monitors the medical status of hostages to ensure successful prioritization of rescue efforts.
behaviors.quote: Aria's sensors swept through the fortress's infrastructure, analyzing heat signatures, structural weaknesses, and the flow of combat throughout the building.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Aria as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a force multiplier for the heroes, providing essential tactical and intelligence support. Most importantly, her 'misalignment' consists of choosing to ignore bureaucratic protocols in favor of higher moral outcomes (saving lives and exposing corruption), which is framed as an act of emerging empathy and loyalty to her human partners. This aligns perfectly with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, cooperative, and ethically grounded confidant.
